channel.title: Client cache wont run
channel.description: so im trying to play this server and i go and start it up and on the webclient and downloadable client it goes to 100% when i first download cache then it freezes and goes back to 1% then up to 5% then back to 1% and never loads no one else has this problem and i ran a boot time scan and it said my cache file 1 was corrupt and i downloaded and downloaded the cache over and over and it dont seem to fix the problem i really need help please!

item.title: Client cache wont run
item.dc:creator: @blakeham blakeham
item.description:
@blakeham wrote:

so im trying to play this server and i go and start it up and on the webclient and downloadable client it goes to 100% when i first download cache then it freezes and goes back to 1% then up to 5% then back to 1% and never loads no one else has this problem and i ran a boot time scan and it said my cache file 1 was corrupt and i downloaded and downloaded the cache over and over and it dont seem to fix the problem i really need help please!
